task.title: Group Event Registration
task.abstract: Only authenticated users can register for an event as a group and purchase multiple ticket types in the Community Portal.

ul.li: Enable Registration Groups on the Event Category record
Ensure the Status picklist is set to Active and the Is Published checkbox is enabled on the Event record
Authenticated users should log in to their Community Portal

step.cmd: Click on Events in the top navbar to search for events.
Click on the desired event to navigate to the Event Detail page and then click the Register Now button to continue to the Event Registration page.
Click Yourself in the pop-up modal.
Select the ticket type and click Continue.
Use the sidebar nav to view additional event details and the Agenda Builder to select any available sessions and click Continue.
Click the Add Guests button in the pop-up modal.

Click the Plus button to add an attendee and enter the requested information. Click the Plus button to enter additional attendees and click the Save Invitees button after all attendees are entered into the form.
step.info: The logged in user can choose to populate the First Name, Last Name, and Email of each attendee during the initial purchase, or alternatively, purchase tickets in bulk via clicking the Plus button without providing attendee details.

step.cmd: Review the group attendees and click the Continue button.
Select the Payment Method, enter any required information, and click the Pay button.

taskbody.result: A receipt is returned along with an email enclosed with the option for registrants to further customize their event experience via the Agenda Builder.
